lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I want to help out people in other countries become more sustainable.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a student at a university in Michigan. I will graduate in one year.

lender.name: Green Mountain Kiva
lender.loan_because: We like to help people.
lender.occupational_info: We are a class of first and second graders in Shelburne, Vermont, learning about people and places around the world.

lender.name: Renate and Peter
lender.loan_because: We've visited Cambodia several times so far and know how much the people there need our help. My husband works as a volunteer in Phnom Penh for several months each year and I'm going to do the same as soon as I retire in December 09.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I have the means and want others to as well.
lender.occupational_info: I help people learn and promote literacy.

lender.name: enoch
lender.loan_because: my idle money can be put to better use
lender.occupational_info: I am a PhD student at the University of Southern California studying the chemistry of fuel burning - combustion

lender.name: ShyTech.com
lender.loan_because: I look forward to seeing other people of the world who are dedicated to work and help others become role models in their community.
lender.occupational_info:
I do web page design and own my own company www.ShyTech.com
I am also a Medical Student looking to pursue a job that will help others.

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: I feel that other charity groups provide only short-term relief. This program allows everyone a chance to use their hard work to create a better life for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: The wandering engineer.....

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: I am very blessed in my life and want to share.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a library helping people find books, look for jobs, get information about health issues, and any other question they may have.

lender.name: Warren
lender.loan_because: I believe that a hand up is better than a hand out.

lender.name: Renee
lender.loan_because: I have been so fortunate in life I believe we need to share our good fortune.

lender.name: Estrella
lender.loan_because: it feels right to help people in the whole world together with many people of the whole world

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I want to help. God has blessed me with money and I want to share it.
lender.occupational_info: I do the accounting for the City I live in.

lender.name: ANNE
lender.loan_because: A lender of nations

lender.name: Anton
lender.loan_because: I want to help people to help themselve.

lender.name: Bertel
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs help from everyone.
lender.occupational_info: I study politics and work in the IT field

lender.name: Teri & Antony
lender.loan_because: when you empower women, you change the world - one family at a time.
lender.occupational_info: Currently part of the 10% that are unemployed here in the United States.

lender.name: Shalin
lender.loan_because: What a fantastic way to invest in humanity! So many people and ideas worth the effort and funding! :)
lender.occupational_info: I ensure technical projects are effectively thought through to prevent wasted effort or rework. This involves setting requirements that can be feasibly be achieved and tested.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: There isn't a alot of money in Small Independent Wrestling and need money upfront for first show.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a Professional Wrestling and a Wrestler Promoter.

lender.name: Wendy and Bill
lender.loan_because: “A person is a person because he recognizes others as persons.” -Bishop Desmond Tutu

lender.name: Carter
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are trying to make a better life and have fewer opportunties than me.
lender.occupational_info: I am a middle school student.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I am just paying it forward :)
lender.occupational_info: I'm a full-time student at a University. I also work part time at a child care center and a movie theater.

lender.name: Nancy, Ken, & Kelly
lender.loan_because: We hope to make a difference in someone's life. It makes us feel good to help others.
lender.occupational_info: Nancy is a college teacher; Ken is a banker; Kelly is a student.

lender.name: Wayne
lender.loan_because: The "market" is the best opportunity for people acting in their own self interest to improve their lives. Gosh, that sounds like Adam Smith, doesn't it?
lender.occupational_info: I used to manage an electronics assembly factory with about 400 employees, but its gone now. I now teach economics at a local college. And I write some stories and articles.

lender.name: Valerie
lender.loan_because: I can...I was a single mother of two and now they are grown up and I have a good job and I love the fact that i can make a difference to someone's life with such a small amount of money. Thankyou to the people who created this site - the concept is awesome!
lender.occupational_info: I work with female prisoners before they are released back into the community.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: It was just luck, karma, what have you, that we were born in a country with more than enough to go around.
lender.occupational_info: I drive trains with passengers in them..."chauffeur to the masses". My kids are both students and they along with Cheryl my wife loan to Kiva also.

lender.name: Rajiv Vutukuru
lender.loan_because: I like giving and helping others in need wherever the need may be in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a 12th grade student at Troy Athens High School, Troy, MI, USA. I lend $25 from my allowance every month to KIVA. I also volunteer at American Red Cross. The following quote motivated me to help through KIVA. "While wandering a deserted beach at dawn, stagnant in my work, I saw a man in the distance bending and throwing as he walked the endless stretch toward me. As he came near, I could see that he was throwing starfish, abandoned on the sand by the tide, back into the sea. When he was close enough I asked him why he was working so hard at this strange task. He said that the sun would dry the starfish and they would die. I said to him that I thought he was foolish. there were thousands of starfish on miles and miles of beach. One man alone could never make a difference. He smiled as he picked up the next starfish. Hurling it far into the sea he said, "It makes a difference for this one." I abandoned my writing and spent the morning throwing starfish." ― Loren Eiseley

lender.name: Bailey
lender.loan_because: EVERYONE deserves to succeed, yet not everyone is given that chance. We all have the ability and the responsibility to change someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: Right now I go to school so that I can make a good life for myself, my family, and so that I can help others.

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: I can support other women around the world as they find ways to make their lives and the lives of their families better.
lender.occupational_info: I support the learning of children and teachers through teaching and writing.

lender.name: Delforge-Melia family
lender.loan_because: It is important to us to support women who are taking initiatives to earn a living and raise their families.
lender.occupational_info: We work in the cleantech industry, to develop new technologies to generate renewable energy and slow climate change.

lender.name: Savio
lender.loan_because: the return is better than a savings account
lender.occupational_info: I do the numbers.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: I am happy to help those that don't get the opportunities that I do. Any life is as valuable as all the others.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a team lead in a 1,000,000+ square feet warehouse. I supervise shipping and distributing food to retailers.we ship food to independent grocers. I dislike big business & corporations. I Love the "mom and pop" little stores, and my job.

lender.name: Bruce & Jackie
lender.loan_because: maybe it will make a dfference for someone

lender.name: Ross and Caren
lender.occupational_info: Caren works as a literacy teacher in Denver, and I work in Information Technology for a local affordable housing agency.

lender.name: john
lender.loan_because: to help
lender.occupational_info: order groceries for health food store. Maintain and promote gallery + boutique of handmade and fair trade goods.

lender.name: Siti
lender.loan_because: Everybody needs a break...and hey if they have the spirit of enterpreneurship within them, they deserve every boost they need..coz god knows I don't have one.
lender.occupational_info: I ignite the passion for volunteerism and ensure the well being of these special beings are taken care of

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: Microfinance can allow skilled people, in relatively unlucky situations, a chance to thrive.
lender.occupational_info: I work in marketing and have done so for a number of years. This makes me in charge of overseeing successful brand positioning and performance through strategy, tactics, and communications.

lender.name: Curt
lender.loan_because: I believe in micro-economics
lender.occupational_info: I teach people about humans and their behaviors. Anthropology

lender.name: Holly
lender.loan_because: This is a great idea.

lender.name: Tara
lender.loan_because:
The Bible says in Romans 12:13 Share with God's people who are in need. Practice hospitality.
So, that's what I do.
lender.occupational_info: I own multiple businesses, most of which involve natural and/or eco friendly products.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: I can. And if I can, I should.

lender.name: Joshua Seymour
lender.loan_because: I believe in people and I want to make a better world for my children, even though I don't have any (I'm planning ahead ;)
lender.occupational_info: Value Creative

lender.name: Millie
lender.loan_because: i need additional fund of $ 850.00 to produce the current order of buyer for my items handicraft Capiz sea shells home decors & gift products
lender.occupational_info: I am a manufacturer and Exporter of Home Decorations and Gift products made from Capiz sea shells like photo frames, curtains, chandelier, wind chimes, mobiles, plates, trays, bowls, Christmas decors, jewelry boxes, vases, tabletops, candle holders, among others. I sold these items via internet..

lender.name: 48 Crash
lender.loan_because: Why on earth not?
lender.occupational_info: I test cars, and write about them. I'm also a musician, which is worth more to people but it doesn't pay as well ...

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: Because Kiva is an absolutely awesome concept and provides the opportunity to connect with people from vastly different backgrounds.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a civil engineer which basically means I am responsible for the design and construction of infrastructure that some people take for granted, and some people don't have access to ie water supply and hydropower Recently I spent 3 months as a Kiva fellow in the Philippines and I am EXCITED because I am about to embark on another fellowship (class 13) to Uganda. Read more about my experience on My Blog.

lender.name: Heitjohann
lender.loan_because: I wanna help to make the world better

lender.name: Ulrike
lender.loan_because: I am able to do.
lender.occupational_info: I'm organizing art exhibitions and selling pearls.

lender.name: anton
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to change their lives for the better.

lender.name: Sabine
lender.loan_because: I like to help other people. I want to give them opportunities to have a better live and because I´m thankful for all my blessings.
lender.occupational_info: I am the Assistant of the CFO. Doing: professional office management, assistant tasks, human resources etc. The buiness of my company is selling on air times of radio stations.

lender.name: gabriele
lender.loan_because: I think it is a wonderful and respectful way of adding a bit of help and support
lender.occupational_info: I am a singer and composer of contemporary music. One of my favourite subjects is teaching and exploring the variety of human voice.

lender.name: Isa
lender.loan_because: the world needs to turn, and the current social system is obviously failing so we people will have to take care of each other.

lender.name: Noel
lender.loan_because: We're all in this together.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: it's a practical solution that works better than charity

lender.name: Ron and Gay
lender.loan_because: We can.

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: I really like to support other people - especially Women
lender.occupational_info: I am a transmitter of a healing wisdom of mankind

lender.name: Ruth
lender.loan_because: This system means that people can make their own lives better, and can be self-determined about how they do that - and the loan system means that I can reinvest this money into different projects once it is paid back.
lender.occupational_info: I help to run a website which helps museums and galleries in the UK, particularly the smaller ones, get more visitors.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to support projects.
lender.occupational_info: see mbites.com/contact

lender.name: Yann
lender.loan_because: I believe it is a good way of help somebody without making too much fuss about it !
lender.occupational_info: I study how people can try and manage their environment in a way that is benefic both to them and to nature

lender.name: Paul and Sharon
lender.loan_because: We enjoy giving people the opportunity to achieve their goals. Joining with many other people from around the world in contributing to each loan is also very satisfying.
lender.occupational_info: We work with drug-dependent people

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I am able to. Something which is (relatively) small to you can make a huge difference to someone else. Besides, I could do with the Karma points ;o)

lender.name: Boaz
lender.loan_because: I want to honor the memory of my younger brother, Asher.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I support the kids at Moberly who support KIVA

lender.name: Susannah
lender.loan_because: so many people have helped me in the past, now it is my turn
lender.occupational_info: I teach art history

lender.name: jack
lender.loan_because: I can afford to loan a limited amount so why not !

lender.name: Carla
lender.loan_because: I am blessed with my health, my family and a good job. I first heard about this idea when I read about Muhammad Yunus and his Grameen Bank winning the Nobel Peace Prize in 2006. I think it is a wonderful concept to help people help themselves!
lender.occupational_info: I work in marketing and have a group of products that I promote around the world. My products help other companies to make medicine and vaccines.

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: I like how easy it makes it to help others improve their lives, and to give something back.

lender.name: Sammi
lender.loan_because: I think the small things each person does in life can make a big impact on the lives of others.

lender.name: Corina
lender.loan_because: This is one of the ways to give back and know that I am making a difference in someone's life and future.

lender.name: Sean & Jenny
lender.loan_because: because I have so much and want to give back.
lender.occupational_info: Connecting people to Jesus by connecting them to one another

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of the individual to affect change.
lender.occupational_info: I am a designer of parks, trails and public spaces. I work with the rocks and trees as well as bricks and mortar to create a more beautiful world for man and beast.

lender.name: Dana druid
lender.loan_because:
Locale does not matter- we are family.
A family shares what they have.
The harvest of sharing is prosperity and harmony.
lender.occupational_info: Healing the environment. (Nature is good.)

lender.name: Ming
lender.occupational_info: Teaching and Research

lender.name: Patricia & Marcial
lender.loan_because: I think we can all make the difference no matter how small our contribution. Together we make a strong force in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I have the best job in the world, raising my three children. It's the hardest job there is but the rewards are enormous. I'm doing what fulfills me as a human being and that is being a mom.

lender.name: Jon Rosenberg & family
lender.loan_because: It helps people develop their own businesses and make a sustainable living with dignity.
lender.occupational_info: I am the director of a Jewish nonprofit organization that drives volunteering and service-learning programs around the world.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: Kiva provides an amazing way to help people achieve their goals, giving them the tools to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am a graduate student. I also had the wonderful opportunity to work with Kiva in the field as a Kiva Fellow in Benin City, Nigeria.

lender.name: Brian
lender.occupational_info: I verify that computer programs work.

lender.name: Magic
lender.loan_because: Ever since I was a pup I knew it was better to give than receive.
lender.occupational_info: Guide dog for a wonderful young woman.

lender.name: Kevin George
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of entrepreneurs. I believe that one of the answers for global poverty is supplying the daring with the means to act upon their dreams. I salute those who are brave enough to start their own businesses and believe in the power of themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student who is blessed enough to have been born into a privileged world that many can only imagine.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: It is unfair that living on one side of a line and not the other can have a great influence on an individual's quality of life and the opportunities available to them. No one, not even those in the poorest of countries should be denied the ability to make a living for themselves due to lack of financing.

lender.name: Husny
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: i am a singer in a music band that plays at casinos in Melbourne Australia and i write songs and make music to sell.

lender.name: christine
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel happy
lender.occupational_info: i look after children and young people who are not able to live with their own families

lender.name: Sumit
lender.loan_because: my family and I believe that such efforts will strive to improve the life of so many folks.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently working as a project manager responsibile for the introduction of a new drug in the North American market. It is approximately a three year project and is currently in the project initiation phase.

lender.name: oladimeji
lender.loan_because: i want to invest information marketing to empower the masses in my country in the little way i can .i intend to use multi marketing system (MMS) to pay my clients . the package will sell business kit that will offer training on entreprenuership with cash for referal and bonuses
lender.occupational_info: my work is info marketing and training of entreprenuers for maximising their potentials and cash

lender.name: Meg
lender.loan_because: I identify with an entrepreneurial spirit and want to help women find financial independence. I have a passion for knitting that I hope might someday become more than a hobby, so I especially look to support textile and fiber-arts enterprises.
lender.occupational_info: I write web-based software used by companies like Coke to get the most out of their advertising budget. It's not as boring as it sounds, but it is challenging!

lender.name: Sandeep
lender.loan_because: It helps.
lender.occupational_info: I work on making displays using micro (very small) machines for wireless applications. I'm into research and development.

lender.name: Jim & Char
lender.loan_because: We have seen how even small amounts of money at the right time can make a difference in a person's life. If we can contribute to that difference in some way, we want to do so.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.occupational_info: I am a social worker and a writer. I advocated for public understanding of the circumstances and needs of battered women. I'm retired now, and I still participate in the battered women's movement, but in different ways. I'm involved in other organizations that support educational, nutritional and financial programs for women.

lender.name: Brenda
lender.loan_because: I have been lifted out of poverty and I want to help others.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: I realize that there are actions that we take, whether good or bad, that have a direct impact on the lives of others around the world. This loan is a positive action that I hope will have a positive impact on someone's life. I may not be able to change the world at large, but I can change someone's life. For me, that it where it all begins.

lender.name: Desiree
lender.loan_because: It´s the easiest way to help people all over the world...

lender.name: Ananda and Skye
lender.loan_because: I want to help other women make a better life for themselves and their children.
lender.occupational_info: I help to plan our health services so that people have fair access to the medical support they need.

lender.name: Sandy Penny
lender.occupational_info: Call Center

lender.name: Mashenka
lender.loan_because: however crappy my day is, however stupid my life might feel like sometimes - I live in one of the richest countries in the world and live a fine and dandy life compared to many - so this is really the least I can do. And lets be honest, this is what credit cards should be used for.
lender.occupational_info: From the rains of Manchester, UK to the sun of Los Angeles...

lender.name: Kecia
lender.loan_because: I have been given many gifts and giving back is my responsibility.
lender.occupational_info: Counselor

lender.name: Eli
lender.loan_because: I want to help others.

lender.name: MKM
lender.loan_because: I have been to many places in the world and I want to help those in places I've been and also those in places I would like to go.

lender.name: Heike
lender.loan_because: I read about Kiva in a magazine. For some time now I have been looking for an opportunity to do something that has a direct effect. Thanks for providing this opportunity!

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I can help someone drastically improve their life simply by lending them money in a responsible manner.

lender.name: Dustine
lender.loan_because: I am a grateful product of the many emotional, spiritual, and financial investments of people who have loved me. Many people, including momentary strangers, have helped to develop who I have become. I feel honored to give back to our planet and society which have given me so much. We are all in this together-we are all a part of a whole.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently working on my dissertation in educational psychology. I love teaching and assisting people to create a life that they love and feel grateful for.

lender.name: Shannon
lender.loan_because: its fun.
lender.occupational_info: I manage translation projects.

lender.name: Meike
lender.loan_because: The best idea for an active help I've heard from the last months.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I feel everyone should have a chance to make dreams come true!
lender.occupational_info: I am a stay at home mom. Owning our own business allows me to do this.

lender.name: Paige and Roger
lender.occupation: womens clothing store owner and software manager
lender.loan_because: Because for some reason GOD has graced us with all we need. It is now our responsibility to help others attain what they need!

lender.name: Khristine
lender.loan_because: We are all responsible for one another, all brothers and sisters on this journey.
lender.occupational_info: My job is to talk with people who have lost their housing, and to try to help them. There are many who have lost their housing where I live, because our town on the seacoast has become too expensive for most people. We build housing so they can continue to live in their community.

lender.name: Laurent
lender.loan_because: Small change can make a better world.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: i like to give opportunities to other people
lender.occupational_info: entrepreneurial, technical, interesting

lender.name: Kenny
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: Public Health student at Harvard University.

lender.name: Jack
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do. "Love thy neighbor" It brings joy to me and to someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I love people, volunteering, photography, the beach, cooking and eating.

lender.name: Tedd
lender.loan_because: It's a nice thing to do.

lender.name: albert
lender.loan_because: I believe that I have an obligation to share and help others who would do the same for me. Helping one person indirectly helps everyone.
lender.occupational_info: My retired interests include family, children and grandchildren, gardening and growing trees.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I have been helped in the past.
lender.occupational_info: I board (take care of ) horses for other people and raise flower bulbs to sell.

lender.name: Joy
lender.loan_because: I hate greed and corruption. I love working together to make things better.
lender.occupational_info: I help a medical doctor who is researching cancer prevention.

lender.name: Sierra & Family
lender.loan_because: We've been given a lot and we want to help others.

lender.name: Monica B.
lender.loan_because: I want to support people around the world in their entrepreneurial endeavors.
lender.occupational_info: I spend most of my work day at home on the computer or on the telephone. Occasionally I meet with my customers at their place of business which is usually a library.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: There is such joy in knowing my small loans may give people a chance to have a better life... my money is His money and I want to give it back to Him... he who is gracious to the poor lends to the Lord... Proverbs 19:17
lender.occupational_info: I take care of sick newborn babies

lender.name: Carvel
lender.loan_because: I like getting to know the people and assisting their endeavors at the same time.
lender.occupational_info: I assist people with emotional difficulties and problems in their life.

lender.name: VeloBusDriver
lender.loan_because: To support sustainable businesses utilizing cycling and/or public transportation.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a bus driver

lender.name: Ian
lender.loan_because: Sometimes people need just a little break to help themselves improve their lives. I know Kiva/microfinance can be that break.

lender.name: Family
lender.loan_because: I want my 8 grandchildren to appreciate what they have and to realise they have an easy life compared to many people and places.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired and now concentrate on my painting.

lender.name: Williams Family
lender.loan_because: We're learning together how to help others.

lender.name: Regina
lender.loan_because: I like to know where my money is going and I can make the money work over and over again. With Kiva, I can claim to be an international financier. ;)
lender.occupational_info: I help keep computers running.

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: Love the idea of helping people help themselves
lender.occupational_info: I work as a family doctor

lender.name: Johanna
lender.loan_because: Its better to give the gift of prosperity.
lender.occupational_info: I run an AmeriCorps*VISTA (Volunteers In Service To America) program that engages people in full time community service with the goal of ending poverty through grassroots community development activities.

lender.name: Shahriar
lender.loan_because: I enjoy sharing in the abundances as I'm passing through this life, particularly so others can get assistance when they need it.
lender.occupational_info:
As Founder of Digital Mark Inc, I help businesses and organizations come to life, and grow. Through design and development of websites our reach is globally accessible. With properly composed media, the messages in communication can be heard.
Personally, I enjoy creating "expressive" media such as photography, music, and film, though there are others. The goal of Giving Muse is to enable music and entertainment to raise funds for philanthropic purposes.

lender.name: Barinder Sall
lender.loan_because: Sometimes just a little money can make a big difference in the life of a person.

lender.name: Keith
lender.loan_because: its a good thing to do... the lord gives and the lord takes away,,,, blessed be the name of the lord,,,,, Go Jesus,,,, you Rock!!!

lender.name: Antonio
lender.loan_because: We are in this together.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mirror in human interaction that helps people remember the beauty of who they are and what is possible in this life.

lender.name: Heather and Justin
lender.loan_because: We have been inspired by the entrepreneurial and generous spirits of our friends at the Racecourse Community School in Kitwe, Zambia and also by our friends in Engineers Without Borders Canada.
lender.occupational_info: Heather is a student of international development who previously worked in the social services and Justin, is an Environmental Engineer.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: It has been said that, "there can be no peace without prosperity." Kiva accomplishes peace through prosperity. Join us! Thank you!
lender.occupational_info: World peace through prosperity

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: After seeing much of the less forunate in the world through my traveling in the miltary. And seeing how spoiled american kids are with all of their toys my little girl included I feel if maybe I can help make a family or child smile and not ever fear or hate the people of america
lender.occupational_info: I clean fuel tanks and inspect the metal for fatigue. We recycle oil and seperate the water from the oil and solids. I work in or on boats, planes, storage tanks, and trucks.

lender.name: Reyna
lender.loan_because: By serving others I serve myself. I feel good doing so. I have created so much more meaning and fulfillment in my life by giving and being in a state of gratitude.
lender.occupational_info: I'm passionate about self actualization. By helping youth self express, self discover, build confidence in themselves, they have the tools to create a more fullfilling life for themselves.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I believe we can all make a difference in the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a public servant working in municiple government, trying to make a positive difference in my community.

lender.name: Edith
lender.loan_because: It is a really easy way to help and it gives me a good feeling
lender.occupational_info: Manager for SAP Consulting

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: A great idea to help and encourage people. Giving them the responsibility for their action helps much more than giving food, so destroying the local market and go back home.

lender.name: heather
lender.whereabouts: Mitchell Park South Aust South Australia

lender.name: Gabriele
lender.loan_because: I just will help
lender.occupational_info: It is an officejob for a company who repairs bicycles & motorbikes allover in Germany

lender.name: Andreas Myrin
lender.loan_because: I like to help
lender.occupational_info: Quantum optics (University level research)

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: it's such an effective way of investing in people to help them long-term.
lender.occupational_info: helping charities with business planning, evaluating their work, and developing new services.

lender.name: Casey
lender.loan_because: I will know where my money is going directly. Structural adjustment and development plans claim to do more, but in actuality we never really know where the money goes...
lender.occupational_info: My master's work is being done in the field of Peace and Conflict studies. I am trying to do my bit to improve the world a little at a time.

lender.name: Cafe la Vie
lender.loan_because: we collect our customers' spare change to make loans through kiva
lender.occupational_info: our customers say we make the best coffee in Chermside!

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: this is a great opportunity to give, help and encourage people

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: I care. I believe in Kiva. I believe in the Human Spirit. I like to be a part of Human Economic Development and Agriculture. I like to Empower People. I believe there are a lot of other people like me. I believe in looking out for Each Other. I believe in Peace.
lender.occupational_info: Raising Energy, Raising Consciousness, Healing, Expanding Important Conversations through Teleseminar/Webcasts.

lender.name: Alicia
lender.loan_because: We can

lender.name: Katrin
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great idea to support people and help them, to start a better existence!
lender.occupational_info: I train and support engineers in their work with CAD and PDM.

lender.name: Hans
lender.loan_because: there are too many poor people in the world. Kiva can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: collector

lender.name: InWebMedia
lender.loan_because: I am being the change I want to see in the world.
lender.occupational_info: We develop websites that make organizations like Kiva possible.

lender.name: Kristin Matte
lender.loan_because: It's a way of getting involved in something that makes sense and is accessible.
lender.occupational_info: As a woman, I value education and independence. I feel solidarity is an important part of why I’m here.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: I would like to help people trying to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I help people find and purchase a home to live in.

lender.name: Ron, Zoe & Kiana
lender.loan_because: We loan because we want to Pay it Forward. Thank you MG.

lender.name: Pim
lender.loan_because: this is a great way to help people in need

lender.name: DAVID
lender.loan_because: Im a bit lazy and have a good chance of getting it back but also the people i lend to are earning it. Its not a handout.
lender.occupational_info: I make sure people have the correct tickets on londons bus'es. I might have to issue a fine or just help someone who is lost.

lender.name: Ramkil
lender.loan_because: We are all God children and every father want the best for their children’s, how could I as a son of my heavenly father not lend a helping hand, to my brother and sister of the world who want to better the life of themselves and their family. We are all human being and we need to respect each other. Help each other.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a multi-level marking company as the helpdesk manager, the job entails repairing computers, training individuals on software and day to day troubleshooting of IT issues including networking, internet and email. Responsible for buying all of the electronic item such as computer, phone, cell phone etc. I work with people of different race, personality and altitudes

lender.name: Carole
lender.loan_because: I know how important it is to find a good sewing machine for a sewing business!
lender.occupational_info: I am a seamstress and craftsman, producing high quality fabric items. I also work with old textiles and linens such as antique quilts, fashioning them into something new so that their history will be preserved for future generations.

lender.name: Jutta
lender.loan_because: I read about Kiva and wanted to join at once! The idea of people getting credits so easily in order to improve their standards of living is great. It`s so easy to help.

lender.name: Kenny
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone who can should - It takes so little from me and it means so much to the people working hard to make a independant living.This is Globalization at it's best ! I'm proud to be able to help a little.
lender.occupational_info: I am independant working as a consultant in the Telco industry

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: it has the potential to make such a difference to the borrower
lender.occupational_info: I fish off the coast of North West Scotland, catching prawns in pots from a 8 metre boat.

lender.name: Grandma Jo & Sarah
lender.loan_because: I loan because my Grandma Jo has been an inspiration to me! I am expressing how amazing she is by doing something awesome for someone else.

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs to be given a chance to succeed.

lender.name: Claudia
lender.loan_because: Microcredits are the best way to help!
lender.occupational_info: Social Work, Casemanager

lender.name: Mirjam
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people helping themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I act in theatre and television.

lender.name: Greta
lender.loan_because: I want to contribute to making a difference.

lender.name: Munsoned dog from IL/USA
lender.loan_because: To bring peace, we must first bring fellowship and support.
lender.occupational_info: If I can't cure poverty with a kiss, I can at least make make people smile and feel good about themselves. My owner uses other ways to be supportive.

lender.name: Nadia Doh
lender.loan_because: It feels great to help someone be self sufficient. I feel like Ive been so fortunate and feels great to extend a hand.

lender.name: Sven
lender.loan_because: It's right. I feel it.

lender.name: Louise
lender.loan_because: I genuinely want to help someone a bit like me somewhere else in the world where they haven't had all the opportunites I have. I really want to see more initiatives like this on the web - let's use it for the greater good! (rather than porn, gambling, phishing...)
lender.occupational_info: I help make websites for companies by talking to them about what they want, giving advice and then working with a team of website builders to get it done!

lender.name: kathrin
lender.loan_because: they deserve it

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: Giving in an atmosphere of dignity brings hope.
lender.occupational_info: I visit with families in trauma/crisis, to bring a presence of peace and hope.

lender.name: Bettina
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a good idea, I read about it in "Brigitte" (a magazine for women in germany)
lender.occupational_info: I improve the quality in 2 retirement homes for very old people, that are in need of care and in a general hospital

lender.name: Marina
lender.loan_because: I want to help people
lender.occupational_info: I'm working with handicapped children.in a school.

lender.name: Lynne
lender.loan_because: Being helpful is good for the brain
lender.occupational_info: I bring classes to the museum, to bring insights from the art to their work, and vice versa.

lender.name: Kellie
lender.loan_because: we are all connected
lender.occupational_info: i help small businesses organize their finances

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: I want to help people less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I assist surgeons in the operating room. I set up and maintain the sterility during operations. I hand the surgeon all the instrumentation, suture, and implants needed to perform surgeries.

lender.name: Melany
lender.loan_because: as Anne Frank put it, "No one has ever become poor by giving."

lender.name: Forward Bound
lender.occupation: Youth Service Center for at risk children

lender.name: Lindsey
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to have the means to help others
lender.occupational_info: software developer

lender.name: Ricardo
lender.loan_because: I am lucky enought to be able to loan.

lender.name: Barbie
lender.occupational_info: I am continuing my education to get a PhD in chemical engineering

lender.name: Kristin Hutchinson
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference, even if it's a small one.
lender.occupational_info: Kiva rocks! :)

lender.name: Donald
lender.loan_because: I feel that everyone must do more than "their part" to make the world equal.
lender.occupational_info: I am learning as much as possible at school so I can even more enrich my life and the lives of my fellow people.

lender.name: Astrid
lender.loan_because: it´s great!!!!

lender.name: SUBIRANA
lender.loan_because: I'd like to help someone have his own job and grow up
lender.occupational_info: Interesting

lender.name: Erik
lender.loan_because: As an economist I believe that the free market can provide a means for people to improve their own lives in sustainable way. Micro loans and small business advice are the seeds required to make this possible.
lender.occupational_info: I run a small company that creates websites and marketing campaigns for medium to large companies and government organizations. I am a true believer in the power of small business as my business allowed me to pay for my own college education and buy a home.

lender.name: Andre & Gaby
lender.loan_because: We can and we like helping people help themselves.

lender.name: Ashley
lender.loan_because: "Believe in yourselves. Dream. Try. Do good."- G.F.

lender.name: Ariane
lender.loan_because: I want to do something to help other people who need it, especially those in the culinary field.

lender.name: Bev
lender.loan_because: It's a gift to be able to help a person make a positive change in their life.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: I like the feeling of connection that lending gives to me. An empowered woman can make a difference, not only in a family , but a whole community and I like helping women accomplish empowerment.
lender.occupational_info: I enter invoices into the computer, pay bills, collect payments, do the taxes, and try to balance all accounts for my husbands car equipment distribution company.

lender.name: Peggy
lender.loan_because: Someone lent me money when I needed it - it should be easier for people elsewhere to have the same opportunity
lender.occupational_info: I help grant makers run their programs more effectively and achieve better results

lender.name: Marilyn
lender.loan_because: I have always wanted to have a personal connection with people I am helping. It's very exciting.

lender.name: JoAnn
lender.loan_because: My sister and I own a company that supports women's health. We endeavor to uplift women globally and believe that Kiva's model is a perfect fit for our philanthropic goals. And, it just makes us feel good to help other women (and men!) achieve financial independence.
lender.occupational_info: We are "women inspiring women to wellness". Our goal is to uplift women to their highest potential, in mind, body & spirit. Namaste.

lender.name: Oriana
lender.loan_because: It brings my heart so much joy to be able to help someone change their life for the better and to support their dream.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I want to support people around the world who are trying to start a business
lender.occupational_info: I work with teens and adults to help them be happy and successful in their lives

lender.name: Jenn
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate to be able to.
lender.occupational_info: I help create packaging and products.

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: People have helped me when I needed help and, in return, I like to help people when I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work at resolving issues so that both companies I represent are happy.

lender.name: Mari Lynn
lender.loan_because: The impact of many small investments is life changing for people in our developing world. Joining together we can make a difference!

lender.name: Hamza
lender.loan_because: I believe
lender.occupational_info: Multitask, type on a keyboard, stare at the monitor and the biggest thing....think all at the same time........whew!!!!

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: I like to be able to make a difference for someone, albeit small. This is my chance to make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired :)

lender.name: Nelson Family
lender.loan_because: we like helping people that strive to make a better life for themselves and their family.
lender.occupational_info: A Military family who loves to help others.

lender.name: Brad
lender.loan_because: I've benefited from many who've lent to me...

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: it's easy, it's direct, it's sustainable and hopefully it helps to make this world a better place for us all to live in!
lender.occupational_info: Protector and educator...

lender.name: Bruce
lender.loan_because: I want to help others and this is a great opportunity to do just that
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers to manage aircraft maintenance

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: If I speak in human or angelic tongues, but do not have love, I am only a resounding gong or a clanging cymbal.
lender.occupational_info: I design and make websites and promote businesses online.

lender.name: Alvin
lender.loan_because: its a way to participate in another person's life instead of just signing a check.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers big and small.

lender.name: Eric, Tim & Page
lender.loan_because:
We loan because...we all need each other in this world.
Our church is trying to learn more about Africa and connect with people in that part of the world.
